scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_page.AddLink('stylesheet', $core_v2_widget.GetExecutedFileUrl('style.less'), "%{ Position = 'AfterTheme' }") #set ($event = $calendar_v1_events.Current) #set($sortBy = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('SortBy')) #if (!$sortBy || $sortBy == '') #set($sortBy = 'User') #end
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('load.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.EventRegistrationList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="linkArea" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="pageSize" labelResourceName="CF_Comment_PageSize" defaultValue="15" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationList_DeleteConfirmation">Are you sure you want to delete this comment?</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Description">Displays registrations for an event.</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Error">Error retrieving comments.</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Name">Event Calendar - Event Registration List</resource> <resource name="Calendar_EventRegistrationList_Title">Registrations</resource> <resource name="Calendar_RegisterSortBy_Date">Date Registered</resource> <resource name="Calendar_RegisterSortBy_Status">Registration Status</resource> <resource name="Calendar_RegisterSortBy_User">Username</resource> <resource name="Cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="CF_Comment_PageSize">Number of comments to display per page</resource> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Confirm_Registration">Confirm</resource> <resource name="Email">Email</resource> <resource name="No_Registrations">There are currently no registrations</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="RegisteredName">Name</resource> <resource name="Registrations">Registrations</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_Cancelled">Cancelled</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_Confirmed">Confirmed</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_Expired">Expired</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_Invited">Invitation Sent</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_NotApproved">Pending</resource> <resource name="RegistrationStatus_NotSet">Unknown</resource> <resource name="SortBy">Sort By</resource> <resource name="Status">Status</resource> </language>
